entry.title: The Only Place I Can Breathe Out
entry.summary:
Author: trexbex

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 97,743Chapters: 44/?Kudos: 129

Summary: Hyunjin takes an advanced music production course to prove he’s more than just a pretty face in dance. Unfortunately (or fortunately), the course is taught by Professor Bang Chan—renowned for his strict standards, harsh critiques, and his reputation for being emotionally detached.Except… with Hyunjin, he isn’t detached at all. He’s fixated.

entry.title: I wish you were there
entry.summary:
Author: violetsundrops

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,562Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 31

Summary: When they were 18, Felix ( at the time Evie ) told Chris that he was pregnant. It was the day before Chris was supposed to go to Ansan for school, so the news created a huge ripple in his pond of thoughts. No matter how much Felix tried to tell him, tried to beg him, Chris didn’t buy it. He went to Ansan anyway. 16 years later, Chris decided it was time to move back to his hometown. He brings along his son, Seungmin, back to Melbourne. Back to a beautiful home. A brick house with a nice lawn. Two stories, five bedrooms. A beautiful home that sits right next to another home of three people, two of them being the same people he abandoned 16 years ago. °°° ONGOING!Updating weekly! ( sorry if this sucks, I suck at summaries! Trust me when I say my writing is better!! )

entry.title: The Cost to Pay
entry.summary:
Author: iaminlovewithjeongin

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 460Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: “$40.37.” “What? It’s that much for two pizzas?” “I don’t think we have enough.” Nicole sighs and turns to the two men standing at the door, pizza boxes still in hand, waiting for their cash. Nicole thinks of a different idea though. “Is there… any other way we can pay you?” Nicole says smoothly, lowering his voice to try and make it seductive, batting her eyes. The two men look at her like she’s a witch.

He was only supposed to pass them along to somewhere safer. But what happens when the strays start feeling like family, and the house he lives in starts feeling like home? Or A hybrid au where wolf Bangchan rescues the members from shitty places and accidentally grows attached.

entry.title: Waiting For Us
entry.summary:
Author: WhisperedPages819

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 958,917Chapters: 233/233Kudos: 250

Summary: When ex-military linguist Alexandra Taylor takes on a high-profile security role for one of the world’s biggest K-pop groups, she’s prepared for the challenges of protecting idols under constant public scrutiny. What she doesn’t expect is the unrelenting pull of old wounds, the quiet magnetism of Stray Kids' leader, and the blurring lines between duty and desire. In a world where every move is watched and every rumor has the power to ignite, Alex must navigate the balance between keeping her walls intact and risking it all for a chance to heal.

entry.title: Escape the Silence
entry.summary:
Author: KiaoweLaccu

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,346Chapters: 23/23Kudos: 81

Summary: This is a sequel and does not stand alone. Please read A Prison of Red Lights first. Thanks!Run… …the wind whispered in the night, a familiar keening under the gaze of the half moon. …run… The whisper grew, echoing off the broken walls, building to a crescendo, the staccato of panting breaths keeping in rhythm with the wind’s urgent cry. Moonlight flashed in faded blue eyes as they turned pleading to the moon above. …run!Their prison of Red Lights left behind them, Chan and Hyunjin follow a call as they desperately seek to escape the burning world around them, guided by the moon and their love for each other. Involves my own loose interpretation of wolf and moon mythology. DISCLAIMER: While they share names and appearances, this is based on the characters portrayed in the videos, not the idols themselves.
